trans-unit.source: Provides a default implementation of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> class.
This is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> abstract base class.

Implementations of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> can use an instance of this class to add a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> to an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet"></xref> class, using the specified claims.
Use this constructor when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> is self-issued.
For example, a claim set for an anonymous user is self-issued.
This constructor calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet.Initialize%2A> method.
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IList`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> that contains the claims to add to this claim set.
claims is `null`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet"></xref> class, using the specified claims.
Use this constructor when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> is self-issued.
For example, a claim set for an anonymous user is self-issued.
This constructor calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet.Initialize%2A> method.
An array of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> that represents the claims to be added to this claim set.
claims is `null`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet"></xref> class, using the specified claims.
This constructor calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet.Initialize%2A> method.
A object that specifies the issuer of the specified in the claims parameter.
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IList`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> that contains the claims to add to this claim set.
claims is `null`.
-or-
issuer is `null`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet"></xref> class, using the specified claims.
This constructor calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet.Initialize%2A> method.
A object that specifies the issuer of the specified in the claims parameter.
An array of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> that represents the claims to be added to this claim set.
claims is `null`.
-or-
issuer is `null`.
Determines whether the specified claim is contained within this claim set.
To find claims that match a claim type and right, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet.FindClaims%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> to determine whether it exists in this collection.
`true` if the claim is contained in this claim set; otherwise `false`.
claim is `null`.
Gets the number of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> objects in this claim set.
The number of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> objects in this claim set.

Searches for the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> object that matches the specified claim type and rights in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet"></xref>.
When the `claimType` parameter is `null`, any claim that matches the `right` parameter is considered a match.
When the `right` parameter is `null`, any claim that matches the `claimType` parameter is considered a match.
When both the `claimType` and `right` parameters are `null`, all claims in the collection are returned.
The uniform resource identifier (URI) of a claim type.
Several claim types are available as static properties of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes"></xref> class.
The URI of the right associated with the new claim.
Several rights are available as static properties of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Rights"></xref> class.

An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> that enables you to enumerate the claims that match the specified criteria.

Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1"></xref> that can be used to enumerate the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet"></xref>.

An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1"></xref> that can be used to enumerate the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet"></xref>.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet"></xref> class, using the specified claims.

The constructors that take at least one parameter call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet.Initialize%28System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IList%7BSystem.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim%7D%29> method.
The object that issued the specified in the claims parameter.
The set of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> objects to be included in this claim set.
claims is `null`.
-or-
issuer is `null`.
Gets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> object that issued this claim set.
When this class was created using one of the constructors that do not have an issuer parameter, this <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> is considered self-issued.
The value for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet.Issuer%2A> property on a self-issued claim set is this claim set.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> object that issued this claim set.
Gets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> for the specified index.
The index of the claim to be retrieved.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> specified by the index.
Returns this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> object.

The string returned by <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet.ToString%2A> method contains the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim.Right%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim.ClaimType%2A> properties for every claim in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet>.
This <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> object.
